name: Sonic Suggests
description: I hadn't thought about mobile version when i was making this game, so it contains very high-poly models, which isn't very suitable for mobile devices. I've stripped effects and changed shaders here and there to mobile-friendly, but overall, this version is something like "Proof of Concept", because few people asked, and currently not supported. You need very powerful device to run this (~20fps on Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 Pro)
